Project.description: Root node for the Software Requirements Specification.

DataModel.description: A specific domain data structure or model used by the system.
DataModel.body: The formal definition of the data model (e.g., JSON schema, TypeScript interface, protobuf message, SQL table).

Endpoint.description: A specific logical API endpoint exposed by the system.
Endpoint.body: Details of the endpoint including method, path or operation name, request/response contracts, auth, and error semantics.

Interface.description: A specific external or hardware interface the system interacts with.
Interface.body: Protocol details, commands, timing, electrical/transport characteristics, and data exchanged.

Story.description: A specific user story capturing a functional requirement.
Story.body: The user story text (As a <role>, I want <feature>, so that <benefit>).

Requirement.description: A specific non-functional requirement or constraint.
Requirement.body: Details of the requirement (e.g., performance target, safety constraint, reliability, security, compliance).

Component.description: A specific UI component, screen, or interactive element.
Component.body: Description of the component, its props/inputs, state, behavior, and interaction patterns.

Tech.description: A Specific Technology used in the project
Tech.body: Specific Description of how the technology is it gonna be used in the project
